name: Pellet Packer: Micro Munch (itch)
description:
Chomp your way up the ranks in "Pellet Packer: Micro Munch"!

"Pellet Packer: Micro Munch" is a chaotic strategy survival game where everything- including your own control method- is your enemy. Only true survivors can take on this challenge and get all the crowns, trophies and milestones!

Plant your defenses, collect micros and be the first to win three rounds!

Play fast-paced match based gameplay with a large focus realtime strategy. Explore the 5 different game modes including Match Mode, Endurance Mode, Gluttony Mode, VS Mode and Blockbuster Mode.

Completionists will especially enjoy all of the unlockable content in this game. As you rank up, you can unlock achievements, such as trophies, milestones and gold crowns! You can also unlock new ways to customize your game, as well as ranking up your Gold Mode!
